casebody.data:
STATE
v.
James A. BRAGG. No. 130P06. Supreme Court of North Carolina. April 6, 2006. Anne Middleton, Assistant Attorney General, C. Branson Vickory, III, District Attorney, for State.

The following order has been entered on the motion filed on the 7th day of March 2006 by Defendant for Notice of Belated Appeal based on Newly Discovered Evidence:

"Motion Dismissed by order of the Court in conference this the 6th day of April 2006."
